baseActions.name: Attack
baseActions.description: Attack Skill against target's Defence to deal weapon's damage

baseActions.name: Defend
baseActions.description: Treat your Finesse as being 4 higher for calculating your defence until next turn

baseActions.name: Feat
baseActions.description: Make use of one of the Feats of Light which require an Action to use

baseActions.name: Miscellaneous
baseActions.description: Use a skill within reasonable bounds, as determined by the GM

baseActions.name: Delay Action
baseActions.description: Take your action after the next person's turn. This is your new initiative

baseActions.name: Preparation
baseActions.description: Prepare weapon after being used for a ranged attack

baseActions.name: Study Enemy
baseActions.description: Test Mind against against the opponent's Mind Defence to gain a Boon

baseActions.name: Take Stock
baseActions.description: Test Heart Awareness to look around for something that can be done

components.name: Interval
components.description: Time that must be taken between attempts

components.name: Progress TN
components.description: Target number that must be reached for any progress to be added

components.name: Completion TN
components.description: Target number that must be reached cumulatively through all attempts

basicFeats.name: Red
basicFeats.effect: Add 1d4 to the damage of an attack that has landed

basicFeats.name: Green
basicFeats.effect: Recover Finesse+d6 wounds. Whilst asleep, roll 2d6 and pick the highest

basicFeats.name: Blue
basicFeats.effect: Re-roll up to 3 dice of any roll after skill re-rolls, but before pulling from the river

basicFeats.name: Gold
basicFeats.effect: Spend gold in lieu of light cost for any non-basic feat of any colour

boonTriggers.trigger: Dropping from above 10hp, to 10hp or below
Having the highest initiative in the first round of combat
Land the final hit on a foe during a combat in which that foe dealt no damage

mechanics.boonUsage: All helpers can apply their boons to the roll

rankSystem.calculation: Sum of all attributes + (1 for each level 3 skill)
rankSystem.featRequirement: Either related Attribute or character level must be >= feat level
